import React, { useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios' import './header.css' import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route } from 'react-router-dom' function Header() { const [burger, setBurger] = useState(false) const [focus, setFocus] = useState(false) const [blur, setBlur] = useState(true) function focusFunc(boolean){ if(boolean){ setFocus(true) setBlur(false) } else{ setFocus(false) setBlur(true) } } return (
{burger ?
setBurger(false)}>
CERRAR
:
setBurger(true)}>
MENÃš
}
{focusFunc(true)}} onBlur={()=>focusFunc(false)}/>
) } export default Header;
